doorstep: Scrapify is a doorstep service\u0020 intends to help out people to sell their\u0020 household scrap like Newspaper, iron,\u0020 plastic books, copies, metal etc. and get\u0020 paid for it.\u0020 \u0020 It is intended to recycle, reuse, reduce up-\u0020 cycle and resell the scrap.It is a platform\u0020 for the residents to participate in\u0020 responsible waste management and is\u0020 best in class technology, logistics to\u0020 process the scrap.
Join: Scrapify is the best place to buy and sell scrap. Join our platform and start selling and buying scrap!
What_would: What would you like to sell?
Select_date: Select a date for scrap pickup
Name: Name
steps: Sell your scrap in 4 easy steps
collect: we collect scrap from wide list of\u0020 items like Newspaper, iron, Electronic\u0020 machine, Beer Bottle etc. we do not\u0020 pick up cloth, wood and glass
Choose_date: Choose a date for scrap pickup
executives: Choose a date when you want our\u0020 executives to come for scrap pickup.\u0020 You can book a request for the next\u0020 day. Our pickup time will be between\u0020 10 am to 6 pm.
pickup: Our pickup executives will call you 1\u0020 hour before coming. They will bring an\u0020 electronic machine to weigh each\u0020 scrap item separately.
bill: You will get a bill on your mobile and\u0020 the amount will be transferred to your\u0020 bank account immediately. The rates\u0020 are non-negotiable, please check the\u0020 rates before booking a pickup request.
